tools.json_lib package¶

Submodules¶

tools.json_lib.main module¶

tools.json_lib.main.json_force_dump(content: dict, path: str) → None¶

save python dict in json file and create folder if error in path.

Parameters

  • content – dict to dump

  • path – path of save json

tools.json_lib.main.load_json_path(path: str) → dict¶

read the json at the given path and return dict

Parameters

path – path of the json

Returns

the json in dict format
